name: AdHack
tag_list: creative, advertising, market, ad-creative, ad-marketplace, videos, audio, images, web-ads, banner-ads, graphic-designers, designers
overview:
AdHack is the marketplace for ad creative. We connect ad buyers and ad creators to help them both win.

For ad buyers, we provide:

  • an inventory of ads ready for purchase and activation,
  • a global network of 500+ creators across media types: TV, web, print, audio.
  • tools to make it easy to find ads and hire ad creators,
  • a commissioning service to get new Ads custom built.

For ad creators, we provide:

  • a portfolio to showcase, share and sell creative work,
  • opportunities to find new creative work and pitch for creative jobs,
  • collaboration tools to work with peers and do better work,
  • search and matching tools to meet ad buyers and sell creative work.
